text: [Ore, jahudijon pajmon sikastand] Va pindostand, ki mucozote dar kor nest, pas, kur gastand [va haqro nadidand] va kar sudand [va haqro nasunidand]. On goh [tavʙa kardand va] Alloh taolo tavʙai esonro paziruft. Sipas ʙisjore az eson [ʙoz ham dar ʙaroʙari hidojat] kuru kar sudand va Alloh taolo ʙa on ci ancom medihand, ʙinost
